recipesJson.name: Strapple Strudel
recipesJson.author: Steevsta
recipesJson.description: The FA Apple Pie and Cookie create the flakey brown outside of this strudel. The Cap CDS in conjunction with FA Joy bring the gooey bakery element to the inside of the flakey crust with some sweetness. The FA Fuji and TPA Strawberry Ripe make the filling that gives off some sweet and tart contrasts.
